Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Unham da badala unham de raba kola hamesa rahina vala baga hai, jinham de thale nahiram vagadi'am honagi'am, uha unham vica hamesa rahinage. Alaha unham tom khusa ate uha alaha tom khusa. Iha usa bade la'i hai, jihara apane raba tom dare
Jadom dharati zora nala hila diti javegi
Ate dharati apana bonjha kadha ke bahara suta devegi
Ate manukha akhega ki isa nu ki ho'i'a
Usa dina dharati apane halatam da varanana karegi
Ki'unki tuhade raba da usa nu iha hi hukama hovega
Usa dina loka alaga-alaga nikalanage. Tam ki unham de karama unham nu dikha'e jana
Tam jisa bade ne tinake barabara vi neki kiti hovegi. Uha usa nu dekha lavega
Ate jisa bade ne tinake barabara bura'i kiti hovegi, uha usa nu dekha lavega
Sahu hai, unham ghori'am di jihare haphade ho'e daurade hana
Phira te khura mara ke cagi'ari kadhana vale
Phira amrita vele chapa marana vale
Phira usa vica dhura uda'una vale
Phira usa same phaujam vica dakhila hona vale
Besaka manukha apane raba da na-sukara hai
Ate uha khuda isa da gavaha hai
Ate uha dhana de moha vica behada jakari'a ho'i'a hai
Ki uha usa same nu nahim janada, jadom uha kabaram vicom kadhi'a javega
